about.section1: Hello! I am a full-stack developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I have experience in developing applications for both desktop and mobile devices.
about.section2: I have worked on various projects, with a notable highlight being my participation in Inventory App, a significant project completed during my studies with my classmates and professor. In that project, I fulfilled the roles of Developer and DevOps.
about.section3: I have always had a passion for programming and possess strong knowledge in HTML, CSS, JS, Python, and various frameworks and libraries. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge by learning PHP.
about.section4: Furthermore, I have experience in utilizing agile methodologies such as SCRUM. I am a quick learner when it comes to new technologies or methodologies, always dedicated to delivering high-quality work.
